original_text: Like as I pleaded with your fathers in the wilderness of the land of Egypt, so will I plead with you, saith the Lord God.
korean_text: 내가 애굽 땅 광야에서 너희 조상들을 심판한 것 같이 너희를 심판하리라 주 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Like as I pleaded with your fathers
in wilderness of land of Egypt
so will I plead with you
